theLegendOfFinn.model.entity.character

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • theLegendOfFinn.model.entity.Entity
      • theLegendOfFinn.model.entity.ActingEntity
        • theLegendOfFinn.model.entity.character.Character
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EnemyCharacter, PlayerCharacter

    public abstract class Character
extends ActingEntity
implements java.io.Serializable
    Parent class for every character in the game. Characters can receive damage from entities, for this they have HP.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
